mapper.insert: INSERT INTO friends (user_id, friend_id, status) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{friend_id}, 'pending');
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name FROM users u JOIN friends f ON (u.id = f.friend_id OR u.id = f.user_id) WHERE (f.friend_id = #{user_id} OR f.user_id = #{user_id}) AND f.status = 'accepted' AND u.id != #{user_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE friends SET status = 'accepted' WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND friend_id = #{friend_id};
